name: qualot-berry
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases happiness by 10/5/2. Lowers Defense effort by 10.
short_effect: Drops Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text.black_white: Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Defense stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Defense stat.
